article.title: Allocating the Book Budget: A Model
article.author: Kohut, Joseph J.
article.text: Inflation is currently affected library book budgets, particularly with respect to the acquisition of serials.. A model is proposed which would balance the purchase of serials against the purchase of monographs by individual funding units within the academic library.. Special consideration is given to inflation as a cost factor affected by both the form of publication and the subject matter.. Applying the model to a specific example demonstrates its use in providing control over collection development and allowing for equitable distribution of book funds among funding units..
